newsitem.title: TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO: CRICKET-INDIA PUT IN TO BAT BY VICE CHANCELLOR'S XI.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-INDIA PUT IN TO BAT BY VICE CHANCELLOR'S XI.

text.p: The University of West Indies' vice chancellor's XI won the toss and put India in to bat in their one-day benefit match at Queen's Park Oval on Thursday.
Vice chancellor's XI - Philo Wallace, Shivnarine Chanderpaul, Gus Logie, Mark Boucher, Brian Lara (captain), Carl Hooper, Jimmy Adams, Roland Holder, Ottis Gibson, Khaya Ntini, Mervyn Dillon.
India - Navjot Sidhu, Ajay Jadeja, Sachin Tendulkar (captain), Saurav Ganguly, Mohammad Azharuddin, Robin Singh, Syed Karim, Sunil Joshi, Abey Kuruvilla, Doddanarsiah Ganesh, Noel David.
